weaknesspolicy.name: Weakness Policy
weaknesspolicy.desc: If holder is hit super effectively, raises Attack, Sp. Atk by 2 stages. Single use.

assaultvest.name: Assault Vest
assaultvest.desc: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.

pixieplate.name: Pixie Plate
pixieplate.desc: Holder's Fairy-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Fairy type.

whippeddream.name: Whipped Dream
whippeddream.desc: Evolves Swirlix into Slurpuff when traded.

sachet.name: Sachet
sachet.desc: Evolves Spritzee into Aromatisse when traded.

luminousmoss.name: Luminous Moss
luminousmoss.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.desc: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Ice-type attack. Single use.

safetygoggles.name: Safety Goggles
safetygoggles.desc: Holder is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.
